description: Probably a blend of meek +‎ peacock, or from meek +‎ -cock (“diminutive suffix”). For use of cock as a diminutive suffix, see also niddicock.

entries.meaning: (obsolete) An uxorious, effeminate, or spiritless man; a meek man who dotes on his wife, or is henpecked.
examples: Viola: a woman’s well holp’d up with such a meacock. I had rather have a husband that would swaddle me thrice a day, than such a one that will be gull’d twice in half an hour.
